title: Ukrainian military had 61 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region, Bilohorivka of Luhansk region,...
content: Ukrainian military had 61 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region, Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Spirne, Ivano-Daryivka, Bohdanivka, Ivanivske, Klischiyivka, Chasiv Yar of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Pervomayske of Donetsk region, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka, Velyka Novosilka, Urozhayne of Donetsk region, Staromayorske of Donetsk region and north-west Verbove of Zaporizhzhia, Krynky of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
